Mon Ami - Social Venture SaaS Startup - Remote - monami.io

Mon Ami is a trailblazing SaaS startup dedicated to revolutionizing the senior services market. With over $15M in backing from top VCs, we're transforming how social services are delivered to older adults and people with disabilities. Our mission is to empower agencies that provide essential services through Medicare, Medicaid, and the Older Americans Act, enhancing the well-being of our most vulnerable disabled and older Americans. Our customers are state and local governments and agencies they work with.

Technologies: Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, Sidekiq, Hotwire, AWS.

Open roles: https://www.monami.io/jobs
